scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 rm s3://depa.io --recursive && aws s3 cp ./build s3://depa.io --recursive --cache-control max-age=3600
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar public/sass/illumi.sass -o public/css/ -w
scripts.post-service-api: java -jar swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate -i http://localhost:8002/static/swagger.yaml -l javascript -o api-temp -D supportsES6=true && copy api-temp\src\api\defaultApi.js src\api\postServiceApi.js && rmdir api-temp /S /Q
scripts.user-service-api: java -jar swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate -i http://localhost:8002/static/swagger.yaml -l javascript -o api-temp -D supportsES6=true && copy api-temp\src\api\defaultApi.js src\api\userServiceApi.js && rmdir api-temp /S /Q
